mapper.select:
WITH PD_INF AS ( SELECT T1.PD_CD , T1.PD_NM , T2.PD_PRP_VAL19 AS ITM_KND_CD , T1.SAP_MAT_CD , T2.PD_PRP_VAL20 AS PD_GRP_CD FROM TB_PDBS_PD_BAS T1 /*상품기본*/ LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_PDBS_PD_ECOM_PRP_DTL T2 /*상품각사속성상세*/ ON T1.PD_CD = T2.PD_CD AND T2.PD_EXTS_PRP_GRP_CD IN ('PART') WHERE 1=1 ) , WK_RS_INF AS ( SELECT T1.CST_SV_ASN_NO , T1.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD , T1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD , T1.VST_FSH_DT , T1.AS_LCT_CD , T1.AS_PHN_CD , T1.AS_CAUS_CD , T1.SV_PROCS_CN , T1.BC_NO , T2.FNL_BC_NO , T2.FNL_ITM_GD_CD AS PD_GD_CD , T2.ITM_BIL_AMT , T2.USE_QTY , T3.IST_DT , P1.ITM_KND_CD , P1.PD_CD AS ITM_PD_CD , P1.PD_NM AS ITM_PD_NM , P1.PD_GRP_CD , P1.SAP_MAT_CD , P2.PD_CD , P2.PD_NM , (CASE WHEN T2.ITM_BIL_AMT > 0 THEN '2' ELSE '1' END) AS REFRI_DV_CD FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_WK_RS_IZ T1 INNER JOIN TB_SVST_SV_WK_OSTR_IZ T2 ON T1.CST_SV_ASN_NO = T2.CST_SV_ASN_NO INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_EXCN_IZ T3 ON T1.CNTR_NO = T3.CNTR_NO AND T1.CNTR_SN = T3.CNTR_SN INNER JOIN PD_INF P1 ON T2.ITM_PD_CD = P1.PD_CD INNER JOIN PD_INF P2 ON T3.PDCT_PD_CD = P2.PD_CD WHERE 1=1 AND T1.VST_FSH_DT BETWEEN #{startDt} AND #{endDt} AND T2.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD != '6' AND P1.ITM_KND_CD != '4'
/* 서비스 유형 */
AND T1.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD = #{serviceType} /* 서비스 유형 (1:설치 , 2:B/S, 3: A/S) */
AND T1.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD IN ('1','3') /* 서비스 유형 (4: A/S+설치) */
AND T1.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD IN ('2','3') /* 서비스 유형 (5: A/S+B/S) */
AND T1.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD IN ('1','2') /* 서비스 유형 (6: B/S+설치) */
AND T1.REFRI_DV_CD = #{refriType} AND T2.ITM_BIL_AMT <= 0 /* 무상서비스 */
AND T1.REFRI_DV_CD = #{refriType} AND T2.ITM_BIL_AMT > 0 /* 유상서비스 */
AND P1.ITM_KND_CD = #{itmKndCd} /* 품목종류 */
AND P1.PD_GRP_CD = #{pdGrpCd} /* 상품그룹 */
AND T2.ITM_PD_CD BETWEEN NVL(#{itmPdCdFrom},'WM00000000') AND NVL(#{itmPdCdTo},'WM99999999') /* 상품 */
AND T3.IST_DT > TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(T1.VST_FSH_DT,'YYYYMM'),-1),'YYYYMM') /* 설치기준 */
) , OJ_LIST AS ( SELECT T1.CST_SV_ASN_NO /*배정번호*/ , T1.CNTR_NO , T1.CNTR_SN , T1.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD , T1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD , T2.WK_PRGS_STAT_CD /*서비스상태코드 */ , T1.CNSL_MO_CN , T2.SITE_AW_PD_GRP_CD , T2.WK_PRTNR_NO , T2.WK_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD , T2.WK_EXCN_DT , T2.VST_CNFMDT FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_OJ_IZ T1 /* 고객서비스AS설치대상내역 */ INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SVAS_IST_ASN_IZ T2 /* 고객서비스AS설치배정내역 */ ON T2.CST_SV_ASN_NO = T1.CST_SV_ASN_NO WHERE 1=1
AND T1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = #{svBizDclsfCd} /* 업무유형 */
UNION ALL SELECT T1.CST_SV_ASN_NO , T1.CNTR_NO , T1.CNTR_SN , '2' AS SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD , T1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD , T2.VST_PRGS_STAT_CD AS WK_PRGS_STAT_CD , T2.CST_CNTC_MO_CN AS CNSL_MO_CN , T2.SITE_AW_PD_GRP_CD , T2.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_NO AS WK_PRTNR_NO , T2.CNFM_PSIC_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD AS WK_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD , T2.WK_EXCN_DT , '' AS VST_CNFMDT FROM TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_OJ_IZ T1 /* 고객서비스BS대상내역 */ INNER JOIN TB_SVPD_CST_SV_BFSVC_ASN_IZ T2 /* 고객서비스BS배정내역 */ ON T1.CST_SV_ASN_NO = T2.CST_SV_ASN_NO WHERE 1=1
AND T1.SV_BIZ_DCLSF_CD = #{svBizDclsfCd} /* 업무유형 */
) , TARGET_INF AS ( SELECT S1.CNTR_NO , S1.CNTR_SN , S1.CNSL_MO_CN , NVL(S1.VST_CNFMDT,S3.VST_FSH_DT) AS VST_CNFMDT , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD', S1.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_CD) AS SV_BIZ_HCLSF_NM , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'WK_PRGS_STAT_CD', S1.WK_PRGS_STAT_CD, 'ko') AS WK_PRGS_STAT_NM , S3.* , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'REFRI_DV_CD', S3.REFRI_DV_CD, 'ko') AS REFRI_DV_NM , S5.CNTR_RCP_FSH_DTM , S7.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO /*휴대지역전화번호*/ , S7.MEXNO_ENCR /*휴대전화국번호암호화*/ , S7.CRAL_IDV_TNO /*휴대개별전화번호*/ , S7.LOCARA_TNO /*지역전화번호*/ , S7.EXNO_ENCR /*전화국번호암호화*/ , S7.IDV_TNO /*개별전화번호*/ , S8.NEW_ADR_ZIP /*신주소우편번호*/ , S8.RNADR /*도로명주소*/ , S8.RDADR /*도로명상세주소*/ , S7.RCGVP_KNM , O1.PRTNR_NO , O1.PRTNR_KNM , O1.OG_NM , C1.SELL_TP_CD /*판매유형코드 : 1 일시불, 2 렌탈/리스, 3 멤버십, 4 회사설치, 5 유지관리, 6 정기배송, 9 필터*/ , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'SELL_TP_CD', C1.SELL_TP_CD, 'ko') AS SELL_TP_NM FROM OJ_LIST S1 INNER JOIN WK_RS_INF S3 ON S1.CST_SV_ASN_NO = S3.CST_SV_ASN_NO INNER JOIN TB_OGBS_PRTNR_BAS S4 ON S1.WK_PRTNR_NO = S4.PRTNR_NO AND S1.WK_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD = S4.OG_TP_CD INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_BAS S5 /*계약기본*/ ON S1.CNTR_NO = S5.CNTR_NO INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_DTL C1 /*계약상세*/ ON S1.CNTR_NO = C1.CNTR_NO AND S1.CNTR_SN = C1.CNTR_SN AND C1.DTA_DL_YN = 'N' INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADR_REL S6 /*계약주소관계*/ ON S1.CNTR_NO = S6.DTL_CNTR_NO AND S1.CNTR_SN = S6.DTL_CNTR_SN AND S6.ADRPC_TP_CD IN ('2','3') /*1 계약주소, 2 배달주소,3 설치주소*/ AND TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') BETWEEN S6.VL_STRT_DTM AND S6.VL_END_DTM INNER JOIN TB_SSCT_CNTR_ADRPC_BAS S7 ON S7.CNTR_ADRPC_ID = S6.CNTR_ADRPC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_GBCO_ADR_BAS S8 ON S7.ADR_ID = S8.ADR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_OGBS_MM_PRTNR_IZ O1 ON SUBSTR(S1.WK_EXCN_DT, 1, 6) = O1.BASE_YM AND S1.WK_PRTNR_OG_TP_CD = O1.OG_TP_CD AND S1.WK_PRTNR_NO = O1.PRTNR_NO WHERE 1=1 AND S1.WK_PRGS_STAT_CD = '20'
AND O1.OG_CD = #{ogCd} /* 서비스센터 조직코드 */
AND O1.PRTNR_NO = #{prtnrNo} /* 엔지니어 */
) SELECT I1.CNTR_NO , I1.CNTR_SN , I1.SAP_MAT_CD , I1.ITM_PD_CD , I1.ITM_PD_NM , I1.USE_QTY , I1.PD_NM , I1.PD_GD_CD , I1.CNTR_RCP_FSH_DTM , I1.CRAL_LOCARA_TNO /*휴대지역전화번호*/ , I1.MEXNO_ENCR /*휴대전화국번호암호화*/ , I1.CRAL_IDV_TNO /*휴대개별전화번호*/ , I1.LOCARA_TNO /*지역전화번호*/ , I1.EXNO_ENCR /*전화국번호암호화*/ , I1.IDV_TNO /*개별전화번호*/ , I1.NEW_ADR_ZIP /*신주소우편번호*/ , I1.RNADR /*도로명주소*/ , I1.RDADR /*도로명상세주소*/ , I1.REFRI_DV_NM , I1.RCGVP_KNM , I1.SELL_TP_NM , I1.OG_NM AS EGER_CNR_NM , I1.PRTNR_KNM , I1.WK_PRGS_STAT_NM , I1.VST_FSH_DT , I1.IST_DT , I1.VST_CNFMDT , '' AS MODEL_NM , I1.FNL_BC_NO , I1.BC_NO , I1.SV_BIZ_HCLSF_NM , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'AS_LCT_CD', I1.AS_LCT_CD) AS AS_LCT_NM /* 위치 */ , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'AS_PHN_CD', I1.AS_PHN_CD) AS AS_PHN_NM /* 현상 */ , F_CMZ_CD_NM('TNT_WELLS', 'AS_CAUS_CD', I1.AS_CAUS_CD) AS AS_CAUS_NM /* 원인 */ , I1.SV_PROCS_CN AS SV_PROCS_CN , I1.CNSL_MO_CN AS CNSL_MO_CN FROM TARGET_INF I1 ORDER BY I1.ITM_PD_CD , I1.CNTR_NO
